#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef long  long int ll;
 
int main() {
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    /* Enter your code here. Read input from STDIN. Print output to STDOUT */   
  ll l,flag=0,t,n,q,r,a[100000],ans,j,i,c,d,e,f,g,h;
  char s[100000];
  //string s;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
        {
       // while(getline(cin,s))
         
        cin.get();
        cin.get(s,100000);
        
        ///{
       c=0;
        l=strlen(s);
       
            for(i=0;i<l;i++)
       {
            if(s[i]!=' ')//&&(int)s[i]>=97&&(int)s[i]<=122)
                {
        q=(s[i]-'a');    
        cout<<pow(q,2);
                if(s[i+1]!='\0'&&s[i+1]!=' ')
                   cout<<"-";
        c=0;
            }
            else if(s[i]==' '&&c!=1)
            {cout<<"$";
             c=1;
            }
            //    else cout<<s[i];
        }
       /// }
        cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
